Key Arguments: The government should protect individual rights rather than suppress them.
Freedom of speech is a basic human right and should not be compromised.
The rationale for censorship, even if well-intentioned, is not justified.
Notable Quotes: The government is responsible for protecting the rights of the individual, not suppressing them.
Freedom of speech is a basic human right!
I may not agree with what another person says but I will fight to defend their right to say it.
